channel.title: Blogs on Franck Cornu
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Franck Cornu

item.title: Focus on the new item selection feature of the PnP Modern Search solution
item.description: Remember thecollaborationcorner.com? Wel…it’s been quite a while since my last blog post. Actually I closed my previous blog (thecollaborationcorner.com) almost 3 years ago due to a lack of time and motivation. After a quite difficult period for me since the last two past years, I finally decided to go forward and open a blog again, but this time using cool new tools.

item.title: New year, new blog!
item.description: Remember thecollaborationcorner.com? Wel…it’s been quite a while since my last blog post. Actually I closed my previous blog (thecollaborationcorner.com) almost 3 years ago due to a lack of time and motivation. After a quite difficult period for me since the last two past years, I finally decided to go forward and open a blog again, but this time using cool new tools.
